title: Deck of war
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Miscellaneous item |name=deck of war |cost=500 |weight=5 }} {{flavour|A deck of magical cards which are useful before and during battle.}} The '''deck of war''' selects its cards from the [[Decks#Archetype_decks|archetype decks]] across versions according to the following table, selecting each deck with equal probability. Since archetype decks contain varying numbers of cards, the probabilities for individual cards in the [[Decks#Composition|physical deck]] are not all equal. {| class="prettytable" !pre-[[0.14]] ![[0.14]] ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] ![[trunk]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of battle|Battle]]
